# Resource (rootly_workflow_task_auto_assign_role_victor_ops)

Manages workflow auto_assign_role_victor_ops task.

## Example Usage

```
resource "rootly_workflow_task_auto_assign_role_victor_ops" "foo" {
  name = "bar"
}
```
